extendedIngredients.name: olives
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 cans (2-1/4 ounces each) sliced ripe olives, drained

extendedIngredients.name: spinach
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 package (10 ounces) frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry

extendedIngredients.name: whole wheat penne pasta
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 package (13-1/4 ounces) whole wheat penne pasta

recipes.title: Greek Pasta Bake
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Cook pasta according to package directions; drain. In a large bowl, combine the pasta, chicken, tomato sauce, tomatoes, spinach, olives, onion, green pepper, basil and oregano.                                                                                            Transfer to a 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish coated with cooking spray. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 25-30 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted.                                        Yield: 8 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Greek Pasta Bake in  Light & TastyAugust/September 2006, p45                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1-1/2 cups equals 366 calories, 7 g fat (2 g saturated fat), 62 mg cholesterol, 847 mg sodium, 43 g carbohydrate, 6 g fiber, 32 g protein. Diabetic Exchanges: 3 lean meat, 2-1/2 starch, 1 vegetable, 1/2 fat.                                                                                                                                                                    Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Cook pasta according to package directions; drain. In a large bowl, combine the pasta, chicken, tomato sauce, tomatoes, spinach, olives, onion, green pepper, basil and oregano.
Transfer to a 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish coated with cooking spray. Sprinkle with cheeses.
Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 25-30 minutes or until heated through and cheese is melted.
